html:
— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Every day, we scour Amazon to find the best deals available. Whether it's something for your kitchen or top-rated tech to give your smart home an upgrade, the online shopping giant offers some of the best prices on a  very wide range of items. Whatever you need, Amazon has you covered.

Get deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the experts at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find our top Amazon deals right now, including our favorite laptop, a compact hair dryer and some capacious storage devices, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. 

► Cloth masks are no longer recommended to protect against the omicron variant:  Here's how to find the best KN95 masks for kids and N95 masks are your best mask option—here's where to buy them online

► Presidents' Day:  Shop the best deals on TVs, appliances and everything in-between ahead of the holiday

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping and tons of other benefits for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The best Amazon deals of the day

1. 14% off: Our favorite TV

We love the LG C1 OLED TV, and it's now available for its lowest price of the year. We loved the incredible contrast and picture quality this OLED panel delivers, the sheer number of features it offers (including Dolby Vision and a 120Hz refresh rate) and its eye-catching design. If you're looking to invest in the best possible home theater experience, the LG C1 starts for as low as $1,296 in its 55-inch size, a $203 discount from its usual price of $1,499.99. (It's slightly cheaper in its 43-inch size, though not on sale, at $1,096.99.)

Get the LG OLED C1 Series Alexa Built-in 4K Smart TV from $1,096.99 (Save $203 to $903)

2. Less than $55: This updated hair dryer brush

Make your morning hair styling routine easier than ever with the Revlon One-Step Volumizer Plus. Typically listed for $69.99, this hair dryer and volumizer can be yours for $52, or 26% off. The Plus is actually an upgraded model of one of our favorite hair tools, the Revlon One-Step hair dryer and volumizer hot air brush (from $34.88), which dried our locks from root to tip with minimal effort. The Plus 2.0 has a slimmer design than its predecessor and a detachable barrel while also adding a medium setting to its low, high and cool heat modes for more styling options.

Get the Revlon One-Step Volumizer Plus Hair Dryer and Hot Air Brush for $52 (Save $17.99)

3. Up to 54% off: These compact memory storage devices

Whatever you need to be transferred from your phone, camera or computer, these select memory storage devices on sale at Amazon today can save it. You can grab the SanDisk Ultra microSDHC UHS-I memory card in a 32-gigabyte capacity for as low as $8.49—15% off its list price of $9.99. SanDisk says the Ultra is best fit for Android smartphones and tablets, letting you transfer 1000 photos per minute. There's also the SanDisk Extreme Pro portable SSD, which has a 1-terabyte model on sale for $169.99, or 45% off. The Extreme Pro is one of our favorite portable SSDs for its durability and ability to withstand water, dust and dirt thanks to its aluminum body surrounded by a rubberized coating.

Save up to 54% on select memory cards and storage devices

4. Half off: These sleek headphones

Few headphones are as instantly recognizable as the Beats Studio3, and right now you can get your own pair for a great price. Typically listed for $349.95, you can pick up these wireless music machines in seven vibrant colors for an eye-popping 50% off, or $174.95. We found the Studio3 to be one of the best over-ear wireless headphones for bridging the gap between a flat, studio-like audio profile with more emphasis on bass and a hefty set of ear cups you can still wear on the go. Its W1 chip can pair the headphones with any Apple or iOS device, while the built-in active noise cancelation drowns out annoying sounds like train rumblings and the hums of an air conditioner.

Get the Beats Studio3 Wireless Noise Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones for $174.95 (Save $175)

5. Less than $900: Our favorite laptop

The 2020 MacBook Air is the best laptop we've ever tried, having wowed us with the speed of its M1 processing chip and near-13-hour battery life on top of the aluminum chassis and Retina screen we loved in the prior MacBook Air model. If you want to experience the power of the Air yourself, Amazon is selling the laptop for as low as $899—10% off its usual starting price of $999. 

Get the Apple 2020 MacBook Air from $899 (Save $100)

The best Amazon deals from this week 

1. Apple AirPods Pro

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for under $180 right now. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancelation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $179.99—a $69.01 price cut from the $249 list price.

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $179.99 (Save $69.01)

2. totes Women's Chelsea Ankle Rain Boots

When there's slush on the ground or rain coming down, these totes women's chelsea ankle boots can keep your feet dry in eye-catching style this winter. Typically listed from $55, you can get a pair of these boots in a chic shade of red for as low as $21.85. The brand says the rubber boots are designed to be virtually weightless, slip-resistant and durable enough to handle all types of abrasion. 

Get the totes Women's Chelsea Ankle Rain Boots from $21.85 (Save $15.51 to $33.15)

3. Tempur-Pedic Tempur Supreme Mattress Topper

Add some extra comfort to your bedroom with the Tempur-Pedic Tempur Supreme mattress topper. Typically listed for $399, you can get the Queen-sized three-inch topper for 40% off, or $239.40. We ranked the Tempur Supreme as one of the best mattress toppers we've ever tried thanks to its firmness and for how well it retained its shape during testing. It also provides temperature regulation for those who tend to sleep hot at night. 

Get the Tempur-Pedic Queen Tempur Supreme Medium-Firm Mattress Topper for $239.40 (Save $159.60)

4. KopBeau Space Heater

Stay warm this winter with the KopBeau space heater, down from $79.99 to just $54.17 right now. Perfect for heating smaller spaces—like your home office—this compact electric heater features a programmable 24-hour timer, an energy-efficient mode and an oscillating design. Better still, the indoor heater comes with a handy remote to make temperature control easier than ever. 

Get the KopBeau Space Heater for $54.17 (Save $25.82)

5. 7am2m Sonic Electric Toothbrush

If you want to improve your dental health, an electric toothbrush could help. Designed to remove plaque, whiten teeth and clean gums, the 7am2m sonic electric toothbrush features five brushing modes and six replacement brush heads. According to the brand, the wireless toothbrush can run for up to five hours on a single charge and significantly improves oral health compared to manual toothbrushing. Usually ringing up at $26.94, you can take home the popular toothbrush for just $21.79 today, thanks to a 15% discount and an additional 5% coupon on the product page. 

Get the 7am2m Sonic Electric Toothbrush for $21.79 (Save $5.20)

Other noteworthy Amazon deals we found 

  • Save up to 30% on Amazon Fire TV Omni Series
  • Save up to 41% on Clorox Cleaning Supplies
  • Save up to 50% on select Nintendo Switch games
  • Stasher Platinum Silicone Food Grade Reusable Storage Bag 2-Set for $7.93 (Save $6.06)
  • Etekcity Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale from $16.88 (Save $3)
  • Hertzko Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats from $17.99 (Save $12)
  • Amazon Fire TV Stick Lite for $18.99 (Save $11)
  • Colonel Popper Microwave Popcorn Maker for $19.97 (Save $5.03)
  • Chamberlain myQ Smart Garage Hub and Sensor for $19.98 (Save $10)
  • BalanceFrom 40-Pound All-Purpose Weight Set for $23.15 (Save $22.49)
  • Bodum Melior Gooseneck Electric Water Kettle from $26.99 (Save $8)
  • Addtam USB Surge Protector Wall Charger Two-Pack for $31.49 with coupon (Save $3.50)
  • Olay Regenerist Retinol 24 Max Moisturizer for $32.94 (Save $20.05)
  • Sensyne 10-Inch Ring Light for $38.99 (Save $11)
  • JavaPresse Manual Coffee Grinder for $39.99 (Save $6)
  • Corsair HS60 Pro Gaming Headset from $49.99 (Save $20)
  • Philips Norelco Shaver 9100 for $109.95 (Save $40)
  • eufy by Anker RoboVac G30 Robot Vacuum for $229.99 with coupon (Save $90)
  • iRobot Roomba i3+ for $399 (Save $200.99)
  • 2020 Apple 13-Inch MacBook Pro from $1,149.99 (Save $149.01 to $150)

There's more where this deal came from. Sign up for Reviewed's Perks and Rec newsletter and we'll keep 'em coming every Sunday through Friday.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
